Kricketune (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0401: Kricketot
Pokémon
#0403: Shinx →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Kricketune (TCG Pocket).

Kricketune has been featured on 8 different cards since it debuted in the Mysterious Treasures expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Kricketune cards are normally Grass-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Kricketune

Kricketune
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Kricketune Mysterious Treasures 27/123 Secret of the Lakes  
Kricketune Platinum 32/127 Galactic's Conquest 012/096
Kricketune Triumphant 24/102 Clash at the Summit 009/080
Kricketune Next Destinies 4/99 Psycho Drive 004/052
Kricketune BREAKpoint 6/122 Rage of the Broken Heavens 006/080
Kricketune Cosmic Eclipse 14/236 Alter Genesis 006/095
Kricketune Astral Radiance 010/189 Space Juggler 005/067
        VSTAR Universe   010/172
Crown Zenith GG02/GG70 VSTAR Universe 174/172
